feed.title: SAP Community - SAP BTP, ABAP environment

entry.title: Hi All I want to start learning ABAP on Hana which practice system I can opt
What happened to e-learning and learning journey on RESTful ABAP programming in SAP Learning Hub
entry.content:
Good morning, all.

Logged into my learning hub after a long time. I remember i had book-marked some e-learning tutorial and some learning journeys specifically designed for ABAP RESTful programming model. Once in a while i used to go and refer them for my technical needs.

But now, i don't see them in my saved settings or anywhere in the catalogue. What's changed? why there are no learning journey which covers RESTful programming.

I tried searching with multiple terms...couldn't find any. Can someone help me understand what happened to those tutorials and what do we have now in case if you want similar tutorials.

entry.title: Error when generating ABAP repository objects wizard
entry.content:

I have updated the eclipse and ADT to the latest version.

Please help in identifying and solving this problem.

Thanks.

entry.title: Amount in Words in Indian Currency Format in Adobe Form (Check Printing)
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have developed a check printing Adobe Form. Currently, the "Amount in Words" field is showing values in Million and Billion format e.g., One Million Rupees. But we need it in the Indian currency format e.g., Ten Lakh Rupees.

We do not have a data source for the form, so I tried to implement the conversion using JavaScript in the form itself.

But this script is not triggering during runtime like when the form runs from SAP. It works in the preview, but not in the live execution.

Can someone guide:

  • How to trigger JavaScript correctly during runtime?

  • Or how to bind a custom script to convert amount to Indian words in Adobe forms?

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: SAP BTP Translation Hub Function for Indonesian to English and Chinese Translation
entry.content: Seek expert guidance for below question from a S4 OP customer who needs a translation tool to support the translation of Indonesian language, main questions in translated English and original Chinese are as below. 1. Can SAP BTP Translation Hub support the T-Code translation? 2. If yes, can SAP BTP Translation Hub automatically bring out all data elements, text elements, screen fields, and so on?  3. Will the request be generated and transported to the production environment by means of the request 问题原文： SAP BTP Translation Hub 是否可以支持TCODE翻译?  如果支持tcode翻译是否能自动带出所有数据元素，文本元素，屏幕字段等对象 是否会产生请求，通过请求的方式传输到生产环境

entry.title: RAP: Which Activity (ACTVT) should be used in Access Control for Access Category "Value Help/F4"
entry.content:
Hi all,

in an Authorization Object in ABAP Cloud the Activities are mapped to one of the three Categories "Read", "Write", "Value Help".

The Categories are used in Business catalogs (where "Value Help" is labeled as "F4"), Role/Role Template Assignments, etc.

For Activities there are standard values (see eg onpremise in tables acl_actvt/acl_actvtt): 01 for Create, 02 for Change, 03 for Display, 08 for Delete

03 maps to Access Category Read

01,  02, 08 maps to Write

But there is no obvious activity value for Access Category "Value Help".

What activity do you use for Value Help?

Thanks for suggestions, pointers to documentation, tutorials, etc!

Regards,

  Wolfgang

entry.title: i have not sap gui and i want to use smartform, i have only sap btp trail account. what should i do?
Tutorial "Connect to Your On-Premise System from SAP BTP" - Business Catalog incomplete or missing?
entry.content:
Dear @julieplummer20,

we were trying to do the tutorial https://developers.sap.com/tutorials/abap-env-rfc..html

We are using a free BTP / ABAP system available in the SAP Partner Edge program.

Unfortunately creation of an outbound service is not possible. We get the error message "No authorization to create objects of this object type in the selected project.".

I checked the business catalogs corresponding to the pattern mentioned in the tutorial.

There are only two catalogs and even the non-display "Management" catalog only contains the applications for display. Please see attached picture.

I would have expected something like app "Custom Communication Scenarios / F2177" for the scenarios and sth corresponding for the service. But i did not find anything. Maybe i missed sth.

Did SAP remove the needed authorisations or can they now be found in another catalog?

Thank you for your help and best regards

Robert

entry.title: Latency Issue between Update/Create Entity & Get Entity Set
entry.content:
Solved!  I needed to add BYPASSING BUFFER when reading the user's parameter id information to get the proper values.

I am working with multiple application server environment. 

When a call to Update Entity or Create Entity is performed to change the user's warehouse, I want to call Get Entity Set to refresh the material master data in the Offline Datastore.   I noticed that the data is pulling from the old value. 

When in debug mode I can see that my parameter values are updated in the database when doing the Update Entity call.  Then OnSuccess I am calling to Download Offline Data, I see that when the call is in a different application server and when reading the plant PID to know which materials to download it is returning the old plant PID value.

This seems to occur only during high traffic times of the day.  Is there something in the MDK that we can do to ensure the 2 calls use the same session?  

Other than performing recursive calls on the Download of data until we see the correct Plant information, what other options are there to ensure the correct data is returned?

entry.title: Unable to connect BTP trail Login Suddely
entry.content:
Hi all,

This is with respect to BTP Trail login which i have created a month ago and i am actively using everyday. I am facing error 'Logon is not possible: Failed to get service instance URL info for https://7ab63f61-d9c7-4bcf-9057-beead39881c1.abap-web.us10.hana.ondemand.com/ui' for the past 4-5 hours, whenever i try to login via eclipse adt tool.

Also, i check this via SAP BTP cockpit --> BTP trial account --> Subaccount --> Services / Instances, getting 'ABAP Service Instance currently unavailable'

Anybody facing this issue, is there any downtime currently going on for SAP trail account

Can we check about this somewhere in SAP BTP cockpit

Need your guidance on this please.

With Regards,

Jagan

entry.title: Tutorial Create a Travel App with SAP Fiori Elements Based on OData V4 RAP Service - Error
entry.content:
Dear Expert, 

Tutorial : Create a Travel App with SAP Fiori Elements Based on OData V4 RAP Service  https://developers.sap.com/group.fiori-tools-odata-v4-travel.html 

class : zdmo_cl_fe_travel_generator is not working, please check!

log as below and attached, please check!

Contents

Header Information
What happened?
Error analysis
Information on where terminated
Source Code Extract
Active Calls/Events

Header Information

Short Text Open SQL array insert produces duplicate records in the database.
Runtime Error DBSQL_DUPLICATE_KEY_ERROR
Exception CX_SY_OPEN_SQL_DB
Program ZFE_DATA_GENERATOR_001221=====CP
Date/Time 08/19/2025 03:06:27 (System)
User CB9980000036 (0ccb1cf0-6e7c-4d1f-930a-85cc19e85875)
Client 100
Host appserver-q2t9s

What happened?

Error in the ABAP application program.

The current ABAP program "ZFE_DATA_GENERATOR_001221=====CP" had to be terminated because it found a
statement that could not be executed.

Error analysis

An exception has occurred in class "CX_SY_OPEN_SQL_DB". This exception was not caught
in procedure "IF_OO_ADT_CLASSRUN~MAIN" "(METHOD)" or propagated by a RAISING clause.
Since the caller of the procedure could not have anticipated this
exception, the current program was terminated.
The reason for the exception occurring was:
The reason for the exception is:
When an Open SQL array insert is performed, trying to insert a record
into the database table "ZFE_ASTAT_001221" causes the function to terminate if a
record with the same key already exists.

(When an Open SQL individual record insert is performed, this situation
does not cause the function to terminate. SY-SUBRC is set to 4 instead.)

Information on where terminated

The termination occurred in ABAP program or include "ZFE_DATA_GENERATOR_001221=====CP", in "IF_OO_ADT_CLASSRUN~MAIN". The
main program was "SAPMHTTP".

In the source code, the termination point is in line 81 of include "ZFE_DATA_GENERATOR_001221=====CM001".
include "ZFE_DATA_GENERATOR_001221=====CM001".
The termination is due to exception "CX_SY_OPEN_SQL_DB" occurring in procedure "IF_OO_ADT_CLASSRUN~MAIN" "(METHOD)",
but not being handled locally there or being declared in the RAISING
clause.
The procedure is in program "ZFE_DATA_GENERATOR_001221=====CP". Its source code begins in line 1 of
include "ZFE_DATA_GENERATOR_001221=====CM001".

Source Code Extract

71727374757677787980>>82838485868788899091
    TYPES: tt_status TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF t_status_fields WITH KEY travel_status_id.
 
    DATA status_itab TYPE tt_status.
 
    status_itab = VALUE tt_status(
      ( travel_status_id = 'O' travel_status_text = 'Open' )
      ( travel_status_id = 'A' travel_status_text = 'Accepted' )
      ( travel_status_id = 'X' travel_status_text = 'Rejected' )
    ).
* insert the new table entries
    INSERT ('zfe_astat_001221') FROM TABLE @status_itab.
    COMMIT WORK.
 
 
    " Carrier
    TYPES: BEGIN OF t_carrier_fields,
             client TYPE mandt,
             carrier_id TYPE /dmo/carrier_id,
             name TYPE /dmo/carrier_name,
             carrier_pic_url TYPE c length 255,
             currency_code TYPE /dmo/currency_code,

Active Calls/Events

entry.title: Tutorial: Create SAP Fiori Launchpad Space and Page Templates - issue
entry.content:
Dear Expert,

i am learning on this Tutorial: Create SAP Fiori Launchpad Space and Page Templates. 

i got below 2 issues.

1. in Tutorial , no guide tells how to create Launchpad App Descriptor Item ID:ZRAP100_###_UI5R and Title ID.

2. when Click the symbol to open the launchpad page template, i got error: you do not have permissioin to access the Manage LaunchPad Pages App.

Can anyone give me an explaination and guide how to resolve this , thanks!!!
